The United States and India open two days of economic talks in Washington, DC.
The US High Court strikes down a California law, saying the law violated minors' right to free speech.
Wildfire threatens a major nuclear laboratory in Los Alamos, New Mexico.
Former Illinois Governor Rod Blagojevich is found guilty on 17 of 20 counts of corruption in a retrial.
Venus and Serena Williams suffer surprise defeats in the fourth round at Wimbledon.
Co - stars Tom Hanks and Julia Roberts premiere Larry Crowne in Los Angeles.
